io.sphere.sdk.cartdiscounts

Interface CartDiscount

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, Custom, Identifiable<CartDiscount>, Referenceable<CartDiscount>, Resource<CartDiscount>, ResourceIdentifiable<CartDiscount>, ResourceView<CartDiscount,CartDiscount>, Timestamped, Versioned<CartDiscount>, WithKey

    public interface CartDiscount
extends Resource<CartDiscount>, Custom, WithKey
    Cart discounts are used to change the prices of different elements within a cart like Line Items.
    See Also:
    CartDiscountCreateCommand, CartDiscountUpdateCommand, CartDiscountDeleteCommand, CartDiscountQuery, CartDiscountByIdGet, DiscountCode.getCartDiscounts()

        See Also:

      • getSortOrder

        String getSortOrder()
        Determinates the order of multiple cart discounts. The string must contain a number between 0 and 1. All matching cart discounts are applied to a cart in the order defined by this field. The sortOrder must be unambiguous among all cart discounts.
        Returns:
        sort order
        See Also:
        ChangeSortOrder

      • getTarget

        @Nullable
CartDiscountTarget getTarget()
        Defines what part of the cart will be discounted.
        Returns:
        the target or null if getValue() is a GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue
        See Also:
        ChangeTarget

      • referenceOfId

        static Reference<CartDiscount> referenceOfId(String id)
        Creates a reference for one item of this class by a known ID.

        An example for categories but this applies for other resources, too:

        final String categoryIdFromFormOrSession = "84ac4271-0fec-49d0-9fee-55586c565c58";
final Reference<Category> categoryReference = Category.referenceOfId(categoryIdFromFormOrSession);
assertThat(categoryReference.getId()).isEqualTo(categoryIdFromFormOrSession);

        See the test code.

        If you already have a resource object, then use toReference() instead:

        final Category category = getCategory1();
final Reference<Category> categoryReference = category.toReference();
assertThat(category.getId()).isEqualTo(categoryReference.getId());

        See the test code.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the resource which should be referenced.
        Returns:
        reference
